title: The Asset Allocator: Coping With The Crisis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: This crisis is different from others in its details, but this we can say from a historical perspective: The doom people have dreaded has never materialized. We’ve always moved on. This podcast (8:12) suggests that what makes market and economic crises so harsh is that they activate fight-or-flight responses, but in scenarios where we cannot fight and have nowhere to flee. It is precisely for this reason that we must distinguish between factors we have influence over versus things that are beyond our control. Learn more about your ad choices.
